com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.options
Class GlobalPreferences

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.options.GlobalPreferences
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, PreferenceChangeListener
public final class GlobalPreferences
extends Object
implements PreferenceChangeListener

General VisualVM settings defined in Options.

Author:
Jaroslav Bachorik

store

public boolean store()
Persistently stores preferences values. This method is called automatically, typically you don't need to call it explicitely.

Returns:
true if the preferences have been stored successfuly, false otherwise.
